text: My todi nadykhnuly yoho: "Zrobit使 watercraft pid nashymy watchful ochamy, ta z路hidno z nashym natkhnennyam. Koly nasha komanda prybuvaye, ta naryvy atmosfery, uvimkayut使 tse para kozhnoho riznovydu (vashoho domesticated tvaryny), ta vasha rodyna, krim tsykh zasudzhenoyi shchob pryrikatysya. Ne rozmovlyayte z Meni vid imeni tsykh khto porushyly; vony budut使 tonutysya
